Todo

A bit of a roadmap/todo

Features

  • support this thing
  • https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/own-disp?CIK=0000051143&action=getissuer
  • [filing_filers] - parse out filer type/role
  • Alias company_ functions to filer_ to cover non-company filers better
  • company href given CIK
  • Return master filing href where possible
  • Parse filing page numbers to enable better manual section describing and TOC parsing/usage.

Bugs

  • There are not enough “exclusions” in xpath for parse_filing leading to parents and children getting selected. E.g. https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/7084/000000708409000051/adm10kfy09.htm

Internal

  • Passing lints
  • Improve makefile http://kbroman.org/minimal_make/, https://github.com/ComputationalProteomicsUnit/maker
  • tests for util.R and get company_information to 100% coverage
  • downstream checks

Package

  • Vignette pulling XBL files using finstr
